news_header: Caterpillar Inc. reported a net profit of $2.791 billion for Q4, surpassing last year's $2.676 billion.
news_original_title: Caterpillar Q4 Profit Rises, But Revenue Declines
news_text: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) reported a net profit of $2.791 billion or $5.78 per share for the fourth quarter, an increase from $2.676 billion or $5.28 per share in the same quarter last year. Adjusted profit, excluding one-time items, was $2.483 billion or $5.14 per share, beating analysts' estimate of $5.03 per share. Operating profit decreased to $2.924 billion from $3.134 billion, while adjusted operating profit was $2.961 billion, down from $3.226 billion. Sales revenue declined 5% to $16.2 billion from $17.1 billion, missing the consensus estimate of $16.53 billion.
